Images.Name: i0
Images.Description: TONSIL - Du and Lin et al, 2019 (accepted)

Waypoints.Description:
Representative t-CyCIF image acquired from a formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded (FFPE) human tonsil tissue section stitched together using ASHLAR software from 224 fields acquired using a 40X/0.6NA objective.

#### Figure from:

Du and Lin et al., 2019 (accepted)

Waypoints.Name: Germinal Centers
Waypoints.Description: Germinal centers are secondary lymphoid follicles where  B-cell maturation occurs. They can be recognized by their characteristic circular shape and are found throughout the tonsil.

Waypoints.Name: Normal Epithelium
Waypoints.Description: Non-keratinizing stratified squamous epithelium, marked by `cytokeratin` expression, can be found at the surface of the tonsil.

Waypoints.Name: Blood Vessels
Waypoints.Description: Smooth muscle cells surrounding blood vessels are highlighted by alpha-Smooth Muscle Actin (`aSMA`) expression.

Waypoints.Name: B-Cells and T-Cells
Waypoints.Description: B-Cells (`CD20`) are enriched in the germinal centers which are surrounded by T-Cells (`CD3`).

Waypoints.Name: Helper T-Cells
Waypoints.Description: T-Cells that express `CD4` are known as T-Helper cells.

Waypoints.Name: Cytotoxic T-Cells
Waypoints.Description: T cells that express `CD8A` are known as Cytotoxic T-Cells.
